main event: 5 to 7 disc-shaped objects were observed on radar for approximately 1 hour, and they were also visually confirmed by the radar crew.
interesting points: The objects moved at varying speeds and on erratic courses,The observation lasted about 1 hour,The sighting involved both radar and visual confirmation,The objects were recorded on a ground radar,The report also includes anecdotal sightings from individual witnesses on different dates.
witness description: members of the radar crew and other individuals who reported separate sightings
